title: Orcish chain mail/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Orcish_chain_mail "Orcish chain mail")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   兽人锁子甲   [![Orcish chain mail.png](/images/9/92/Orcish_chain_mail.png)](/wiki/File:Orcish_chain_mail.png) |                                                                                                                 |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                                            | 粗糙锁子甲                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                 |
| 装备槽位                                                                                                          | [铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")                                                                             |
| AC                                                                                                            | [4](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)") |
| 特殊效果                                                                                                          | - [MC1](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")                 |
|                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                 |
| 基础价                                                                                                           | 75 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                          |
| 重量                                                                                                            | [300](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                   |
| 材料                                                                                                            | [铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")                               |

**兽人锁子甲**（orcish chain mail）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**粗糙锁子甲**（crude chain mail）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 dNethack](#dNethack)
  - [5.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")种族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人锁子甲[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。兽人族角色若在游戏开始时会获得[锁子甲](/wiki/%E9%94%81%E5%AD%90%E7%94%B2 "锁子甲")，则改为获得兽人锁子甲，但由于游戏中不存在初始装备有锁子甲的职业，所以该替换机制在游戏里不会触发[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[魔多兽人](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E5%A4%9A%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔多兽人 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件兽人锁子甲[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。[兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄2的概率获得与魔多兽人相同的初始装备，因此有1⁄6的概率获得兽人锁子甲[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 描述

兽人锁子甲的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为4，并能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")1。

## 策略

和大多数兽人族装备一样，兽人锁子甲的性能比普通[锁子甲](/wiki/%E9%94%81%E5%AD%90%E7%94%B2 "锁子甲")要低，其AC加成和[鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "鳞甲")相同，但鳞甲更轻。兽人锁子甲只适合在玩家找到[秘银胶衣](/wiki/%E7%A7%98%E9%93%B6%E8%83%B6%E8%A1%A3 "秘银胶衣")之类的更好的铠甲前作为过渡装备。

## 历史

兽人锁子甲最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Orcish_chain_mail/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants give orcs (including orcish player characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish chain mail, making it as effective for orcs as regular chain mail worn by other races.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), orcish [Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") that start with chain mail will receive orcish chain mail instead, using the existing racial substitution code.

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail, and vice versa.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

### dNethack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), orcish chain mail grants 2 AC, 2 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC1 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 150 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

Orcish chain mail can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail") and an [orcish shield](/wiki/Orcish_shield "Orcish shield").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

In addition to EvilHack forging recipes, upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 859](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L859)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 221](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L221)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 402](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L402)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 400](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L400)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Orcish chain mail/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Orcish chain mail
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   兽人锁子甲  
外观 粗糙锁子甲
装备槽位 铠甲
AC 4
特殊效果
  • MC1
基础价 75 zm
重量 300
材料 铁

兽人锁子甲（orcish chain mail）是NetHack中的一种铠甲类防具。它由铁制成，未鉴定时外观为粗糙锁子甲（crude chain mail）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 UnNetHack
    • 5.3 dNethack
    • 5.4 EvilHack
    • 5.5 Hack'EM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

兽人种族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人锁子甲[1]。兽人族角色若在游戏开始时会获得锁子甲，则改为获得兽人锁子甲，但由于游戏中不存在初始装备有锁子甲的职业，所以该替换机制在游戏里不会触发[2]。

魔多兽人生成时有1⁄3的概率携带一件兽人锁子甲[3]。兽人队长生成时有1⁄2的概率获得与魔多兽人相同的初始装备，因此有1⁄6的概率获得兽人锁子甲[4]。

描述

兽人锁子甲的基础AC加成为4，并能提供MC1。

策略

和大多数兽人族装备一样，兽人锁子甲的性能比普通锁子甲要低，其AC加成和鳞甲相同，但鳞甲更轻。兽人锁子甲只适合在玩家找到秘银胶衣之类的更好的铠甲前作为过渡装备。

历史

兽人锁子甲最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Some variants give orcs (including orcish player characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish chain mail, making it as effective for orcs as regular chain mail worn by other races.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, orcish Undead Slayers that start with chain mail will receive orcish chain mail instead, using the existing racial substitution code.

Upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail, and vice versa.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

dNethack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, orcish chain mail grants 2 AC, 2 DR and MC1 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 150 aum.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

Orcish chain mail can be created at a forge by combining ring mail and an orcish shield.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

In addition to EvilHack forging recipes, upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 859
  2. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 221
  3. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 402
  4. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 400

|cost=75 |weight=300 |material=铁 }} '''兽人锁子甲'''（orcish chain mail）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[铠甲]]类[[防具]]。它由[[铁]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''粗糙锁子甲'''（crude chain mail）。 == 生成 == [[兽人（起始种族）|兽人]]种族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人锁子甲{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|859|nethack=3.6.7}}。兽人族角色若在游戏开始时会获得[[锁子甲]]，则改为获得兽人锁子甲，但由于游戏中不存在初始装备有锁子甲的职业，所以该替换机制在游戏里不会触发{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|221|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 [[魔多兽人]]生成时有{{frac|3}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一件兽人锁子甲{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|402|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[兽人队长]]生成时有{{frac|2}}的概率获得与魔多兽人相同的初始装备，因此有{{frac|6}}的概率获得兽人锁子甲{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|400|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 兽人锁子甲的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为4，并能提供{{cnlink|MC}}1。 == 策略 == 和大多数兽人族装备一样，兽人锁子甲的性能比普通[[锁子甲]]要低，其AC加成和[[鳞甲]]相同，但鳞甲更轻。兽人锁子甲只适合在玩家找到[[秘银胶衣]]之类的更好的铠甲前作为过渡装备。 == 历史 == 兽人锁子甲最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} Some variants give orcs (including orcish player characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish chain mail, making it as effective for orcs as regular chain mail worn by other races. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], orcish [[Undead Slayer]]s that start with chain mail will receive orcish chain mail instead, using the existing racial substitution code. [[Upgrading]] orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail, and vice versa. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters. ===dNethack=== In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], orcish chain mail grants 2 AC, 2 [[DR]] and MC1 when worn, and its weight is reduced to 150 [[aum]]. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters. Orcish chain mail can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining [[ring mail]] and an [[orcish shield]]. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], orcish chain mail grants +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters. In addition to EvilHack forging recipes, upgrading orcish chain mail will produce regular chain mail and vice versa, as in SLASH'EM. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Body armor/zh-CN|SHOURENSUOZIJIA]] [[Category:Orcish items/zh-CN|SUOZIJIA]]
